sentences.en: Consumers will not have to junk their old cassettes to use the new format.
sentences.cn: 消费者将不必丢弃他们的旧盒带而采用新的制式。

sentences.en: He had an assemblage of old junk cars filling the backyard.
sentences.cn: 他的后院里堆满了废旧汽车。

sentences.en: I bought this old table in a junk shop.
sentences.cn: 我在旧货店里买了这张旧桌子.

sentences.en: I wouldn't have time to scout the area for junk.
sentences.cn: 我没空在这个地区找没用的东西。

sentences.en: I'm fed up with that piece of junk.
sentences.cn: 那一大块肉把我撑得饱饱的.

sentences.en: I've cleared out all that old junk in the attic.
sentences.cn: 我把阁楼里所有的废旧杂物都清除干净了。

sentences.en: It is folly to buy such a junk at $ 100.
sentences.cn: 花一百美元买这样的旧化是愚蠢的.

sentences.en: Raise you hands if you like junk food.
sentences.cn: 提高你的手如果你喜欢垃圾食品。

sentences.en: Rose finds her furniture in junk shops.
sentences.cn: 罗丝从旧货店买来了家具。

sentences.en: She tried to fob all her junk off onto me.
sentences.cn: 她设法向我骗售她的所有旧货.

sentences.en: The junk market has been unsettled for the past seven months.
sentences.cn: 过去7个月中废旧货市场一直起伏不定。

sentences.en: There are racks of musty clothing and piles of junk.
sentences.cn: 有几架子发霉的衣物和成堆的废旧杂物。

sentences.en: They cleared out the junk room to make a tiny beds.
sentences.cn: 他们将废品间清理用作小卧室.
这个壁橱里塞满了杂物。

sentences.en: We have an immunity to all of the junk that lies at the edges of our culture.
sentences.cn: 这是一个道理。 我们已经对于我们社会文化中的各种垃圾产生了免 疫力。

sentences.en: We're going to junk these computers, they are obsolete.
sentences.cn: 我们准备换掉这些计算机, 因为都过时了.

sentences.en: What mattered was that the room over the junk - shop should exist.
sentences.cn: 重要的是,旧货铺楼上的屋子居然还存在.

sentences.en: You should get rid of all the old junk in the room.
sentences.cn: 你该把室内的所有破烂清除掉.

words.tran_cn: 吸毒者；毒品贩子；废旧品商人

phrases.tran_cn: 垃圾债券；价格低但风险大的债券
垃圾食物；无营养的速食；华而不实的东西
n. （美）垃圾邮件；邮寄宣传品
旧货商店；无意义信号；报废卫星；碎片

trans.tran_cn: 废旧物品，破烂物，中国式平底帆船，便宜货，假货，废话，哄骗
trans.tran_en: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
to get rid of something because it is old or useless
to get rid of something because it is old or useless
